abstract: Warren E. Buffett’s company, Berkshire Hathaway, reported that its second-quarter net income fell 40 percent, as declining stock prices depressed the value of its derivatives contracts.
snippet: Warren E. Buffett’s company, Berkshire Hathaway, reported that its second-quarter net income fell 40 percent, as declining stock prices depressed the value of its derivatives contracts.
lead_paragraph: Warren E. Buffett‘s company, Berkshire Hathaway, reported late Friday that its second-quarter net income fell 40 percent, as declining stock prices depressed the value of its derivatives contracts, Reuters reports.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Burlington Northern and Santa Fe Railway
